detailedText.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"value":"A game by Recloak - Mix four initial things to make more things, so you can mix more stuff, and make even more things.","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"\n\nDuring 2018 our artists worked as 2D-art consultants on Little Alchemist 2, using Photoshop Illustrator.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Client: ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"http://recloak.com/"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Recloak","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Category: Graphics","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Website: ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://littlealchemy2.com/"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Little Alchemy 2","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}
